import.title: Import material
import.importAddTooltip: Existing material will be supplemented with the content of the Excel spreadsheet.
import.importReplaceTooltip: Existing material will be deleted and replaced with the content of the Excel spreadsheet.
import.importReplaceConfirm: Do you really want to delete all existing material of this department?
import.nameRequired: You must assign the name of the material.
